attributes.action: get cameron out, and deport ALL Muslim's
attributes.additional_details:
David Cameron needs to go. Hes now saying " There is too many WHITE Christian faces in Britain" he's allowing ALL Muslim's to enter Britain with out any problem.  And also allowing them to change OUR churches into mosques... and to giving them the right to dictate to us..
They want us to live by there rules in our country.  I could go on and on... This needs to be stoped now before its to late.
Thank you
